bropals.lib.simplegame.state

Class EntityState

  • java.lang.Object
    • bropals.lib.simplegame.state.GameState
      • bropals.lib.simplegame.state.EntityState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    KeyListener, MouseListener

    public class EntityState
extends GameState
    Implements Entity rendering and updating. Need to call super in all methods.
